page.title: 15Upton Youth Organisations.
page.content: {St. John Ambulance}Cadets meet on Wednesday at the Church Hall, Old Street. Upton Cub Pack meet on Friday, Scout Troop Wednesday, Brownie Pack Wednesday, Girl Guide Company on Monday. All meetings are held at Organisation Headquarters, Laburnham Walk,Upton.{Scout and Guide}Band practise at the Hill School on Thursdays. The Upton Youth Band practise at the Junior School on Thursday. Youth Club Organsiations hold meetings every week on Friday. The{Duke of Edinburgh Award Scheme meet every other Thursday at the Hill School, Tunnel Hill, Upton. The Treble Cleffs Recorder Group for young people over the age of eleven meet for rehearsals alternate Tuesdays at the Junior School. All above meet in the evenings.Ballet and Modern dancing at Memorial Hall Saturday morning.
